Tunis R. Cooper property
This photo was taken by John Borelli's great-grandfather. It is believed to have been taken around 1830. David Demarest originally purchased the site of the chair factory in 1663. This site was under the ownership of the Demarest family until 1758. The property is listed in the National and New Jersey Registers of Historic Places.
